ItemFilterRegex.Name: Dungeons
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: (?<! Heroic.*)(Ahn'kahet|Azjol-Nerub|Stratholme|Drak'Tharon|Gundrak|Halls of Lightning|Halls of Stone|Nexus|Oculus|Trial of the Champion|Utgarde Keep|Utgarde Pinnacle|Violet Hold|Pit of Saron|Halls of Reflection|Forge of Souls)

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Trial of the Champion
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Trial of the Champion|Found in Confessor's Cache in Heroic Trial of the Champion

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Dungeons (Heroic)
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Heroic.*(Ahn'kahet|Azjol-Nerub|Stratholme|Drak'Tharon|Gundrak|Halls of Lightning|Halls of Stone|Nexus|Oculus|Trial of the Champion|Utgarde Keep|Utgarde Pinnacle|Violet Hold|Pit of Saron|Halls of Reflection|Forge of Souls)|Sjonnir The Ironshaper in $|Zuramat the Obliterator in $|Drakkari Elemental in $

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Military Quarter
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Instructor Razuvious|Gothik the Harvester|The Four Horsemen|Four Horsemen Chest

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Military Quarter
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Instructor Razuvious|Gothik the Harvester|The Four Horsemen|Four Horsemen Chest

ItemFilterRegex.Name: 25 Man Raids
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Heroic.*(Naxxramas|Eye of Eternity|Obsidian Sanctum|Archavon)$|\(25|Sartharion in $|Alexstrasza's Gift in $

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Trial of the Grand Crusader
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Heroic Trial of the Crusader \(10|Tribute Chest

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Trial of the Grand Crusader
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Heroic Trial of the Crusader \(25|Champions' Cache in $|Tribute Chest

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Tier 9 Raids (10/25)
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Trial of the Crusader|Champions' Cache in $

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Special Currency (Badges, Rings, etc.)
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Purchasable with|Harold Winston|Valerie Langrom|Magister Brasael|Dubin Clay|Lady Palanseer|Arcanist Ivrenne|Paldesse|Purkom|'Grizzly' D\. Adams|Brightlink

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Knights of the Ebon Blade
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Duchess Mynx|Knights of the Ebon|Ebon Blade

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Factions & Vendors
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Friendly|Honored|Revered|Exalted|Duchess Mynx|Archmage Alvareaux|Cielstrasza|Tanak|Geen|Veteran Crusader Aliocha Segard|Lillehoff|Horde Expedition|Kalu'ak|Logistics Officer Brighton|Alliance Vanguard|\dg.*\ds.*\dc

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Rare Elite
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Aotona|Dirkee|Griegen|High Thane Jorfus|Icehorn|King Ping|Old Crystalbark|Putridus the Ancient|Seething Hate|Terror Spinner|Vigdis the War Maiden|Vyragosa|Zul'drak Sentinel|Tukemuth|Syreian the Bonecarver|Scarlet Highlord Daion|Perobas the Bloodthirster|Loque'nahak|King Krush|Hildana Deathstealer|Grocklar|Fumblub Gearwind|Crazed Indu'le Survivor

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Arena Points
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Arena Points|Blazzek the Biter|Argex Irongut|Nargle Lashcord|Grex Brainboiler|Trapjaw Rix|for 0 Points| 0 PVP|PvP Item

ItemFilterRegex.Name: PVP
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Points|Mark of Honor|Hall of Legends|Champions' Hall|Griz Gutshank|Argex Irongut|Travis Day|Nargle Lashcord|Blazzek the Biter|Ecton Brasstumbler|Doris Volanthius|Evee Copperspring|Trapjaw Rix|PvP

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Burning Crusade
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Sunwell|Yrma|Theremis|Tydormu|Black Temple|Hyjal|Veynna Dawnstar|Tempest Keep|Serpentshrine Cavern|Zul'Aman|G'eras|Anwehu|Badge of Justice|Asuur|Karazhan|Gruul's Lair|Magtheridon's Lair|Old Hillsbrad Foothills|Blood Furnace|Slave Pens|Arcatraz|Underbog|Shattered Halls|Hellfire Ramparts|Magisters' Terrace|Auchenai Crypts|Shadow Labyrinth|Sethekk Halls|Steamvault|Mana-Tombs|Botanica|Mechanar|Black Morass|Spirit Shard|Forgotten Vanquisher

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Refresh from Armory
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Unknown|Champions' Cache in $|Onyxia in $|Alexstrasza's Gift in $|Sjonnir The Ironshaper in $|Zuramat the Obliterator in $|Drakkari Elemental in $

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Refresh from Wowhead
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Drops from in $|(?<!Reward from.*) in Ulduar$

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Unknown (Refresh)
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: (?>!Onyxia.*)Unknown|Drops from in $|Lady Palanseer|Champions' Cache in $|Onyxia in $|Alexstrasza's Gift in $|Sjonnir The Ironshaper in $|Zuramat the Obliterator in $|Drakkari Elemental in $

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Not found on armory
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Not found on armory|Armory reports no source
